attributes.action: When Setting up the United Kingdom Border Agency (UKBA) part of the Home Office, Please include the Crown Crest on any Uniforms issused to Staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom Border Agency (UKBA) which will be set up maybe next year in the later part of 2008. It's Important that staff are trained well and have smart new uniforms that display the Crown Crest as it is a Civil Service Department which will provide the secuirty and safety to people who use UK Seaports & Airports and EuroTunnel. Having a Crown Crest will make staff take pride in the Agency they will serve and pride in the United Kingdom and everybody who comes and leaves the UK to see highly trained staff doing there bit for Society.
